WorkItem.Description:
The default stencil resource files are not 

Affected files:

* include\res\dllmgr.srf
* include\res\stencilmgr.srf
* include\res\threadmgr.srf

Among the errors are:

* missing DOCTYPE
* missing <head> and <title> tag
* attributes _bgcolor_, _align_ not allowed
* border attribute should be implemented in CSS 
* id vs. name attribute in forms
* ...
